title: november 7: heist at the museum (with JAWNY)
description:
Today on the pod, Maia talks about a humongous art theft in Sweden, to the tune of 7 paintings worth $52 million. She’s also joined by special musical guest JAWNY who talks about a monumental tour date. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
